com.orientechnologies.orient.server.config

Class OServerConfigurationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.orientechnologies.orient.server.config.OServerConfigurationManager

  • public class OServerConfigurationManager
extends Object
    Server configuration manager. It manages the orientdb-server-config.xml file.
    Author:
    Luca Garulli (l.garulli--(at)--orientdb.com)
